title: race: random package build failures
body:
Occasionally the linux/amd64-race and darwin/amd64-race builders fail the build because
a package fails to build.

No further details are provided.

Some examples are

http://build.golang.org/log/189c365795c5ffb298c0df6b9134dbbe853c770a
http://build.golang.org/log/a54acaaf533faf2c01fcbe0789873b7fcf084a85
